survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess customer satisfaction levels and preferences regarding subscription-based meal kit delivery services.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based meal kit services?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment customers based on their tenure with the service.

script.question_text: How long have you been using subscription-based meal kit services?

questions.question_text: Which factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key drivers behind subscription decisions.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes and an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which factors influenced your decision to subscribe to a meal kit service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction with ingredient quality.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of ingredients provided in your meal kits?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for service improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this meal kit service to others?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this meal kit service to others?
